# CLAUDE.md

This file provides guidance to Claude Code (claude.ai/code) when working with code in this repository.

## Project Overview

**repolex-www** - Simple website with blog for repolex.ai, hosted on GitHub Pages.

## Git Configuration

Co-author all commits with:
```
Co-Authored-By: spacegoatai <spacegoatai@gmail.com>
```

**Do not** include "Generated by Claude" or similar attribution in commit messages.

## Deployment

Static site hosted via GitHub Pages.
